title: Backend Software Developer - Web3
description:
Are you a Backend Software Engineer with a keen interest in everything Web3 and how this can be applied to iGaming? Then this is the role for you! We are looking for a Software Engineer to help us in the beginning of our journey to bring new and innovative iGaming products and brands to the market, leveraging the exciting possibilities provided by Web3 concepts and technologies.
 


**The Wow** 

 As s Backend Developer you will be responsible for the server-side code and APIs of our web applications. You will work closely with our development team to ensure system consistency and to create a great user experience.
 


**A taster of what you will be involved with** 
* Participate in sprint planning, task estimation, development testing, code reviews and deploying software
* Maintenance and improving of existing software
* Designing code, unit tests
* Managing SQL and NoSQL data models


 What we are looking for
 * 5+ years as a backend developer
* 5+ years of developing backend systems, preferably in .NET/C# with knowledge in ASP.NET Web API
* Proficiency in SQL Server or Postgres; both in writing queries and tuning performance
* Experience with blockchain integrations
* Experience in design and implementation of distributed and multi-tier systems, understanding SOA principles and service oriented environments (multiple services, multiple machines)
* Knowledge in automated testing and continuous integration
* Use of agile/lean methodologies for continuous delivery and improvement
* Experience of coaching and mentoring junior colleagues
* Confident in both written and spoken English


 Extra awesome if you have
 * NoSQL databases (Couchbase)
* CRM Systems
* .NET Core
* Knowledge in HTML 5, CSS, JS, jQuery and/or JavaScript frameworks
* Distributed microservice-based architectures
* We don’t expect you to be an expert in all of these technologies but would anticipate experience with some combined with a curiosity for others Docker, Consul, etcD, Kubernetes, Elasticsearch, Apache Kafka, RabbitMQ



  
 


**What we offer** 

 Much like riding a rollercoaster, sometimes life at Betsson can be lightning fast with twists and turns but always FUN! Then again, what else would you expect from a business 75% millennial and 1700 strong, spread across 7 offices with 900 based out of our Malta HQ alone! We recognise it may not be for the faint-hearted, but if you’re a go-getter, initiator and adrenaline junkie, always striving to push the boundaries and challenge yourself, then you’ll fit right in.
 



  
 


 Challenge accepted?
 
***By submitting your application, you understand that your personal data will be processed as set out in our Privacy Policy***

title: Senior Frontend Developer
description:
We’re looking for a Senior Frontend Engineer for our client in Stockholm!
 



  





  





**The role** 




 You'll be working with an exciting deep-tech start-up building a cutting-edge collaboration platform for the manufacturing industry, working at the frontier of engineering, cloud-native platforms, and intelligent design automation.
 



  





 The work consists of high-performance, real-time product interfaces used by expert users to explore complex designs, collaborate live, and make critical decisions. This is a high-agency role with real architectural ownership and direct impact on how the product evolves.
 



  





**What you’ll be doing** 



* Building core product interfaces using React, Next.js, and TypeScript
* Designing and maintaining reusable, accessible UI systems
* Implementing real-time collaboration features over WebSockets
* Working closely with product and design to ship intuitive, polished experiences
* Optimising rendering performance, asset loading, and perceived latency in complex UIs



  





**Requirements** 



* 5+ years of experience building modern frontend applications in React.
* Deep understanding of component architecture, performance, and accessibility
* Product mindset: you care about how things are used, not just how they’re built
* Proven experience working in a fast-paced, high-ownership, environment.
* Fluent English Speaker



  





**Bonus** 
 - Any experience with WebGL, WebGPU, or 3D-adjacent frontend work
 



  





**What's on offer** 



* Above market base salary
* ITP Pension model
* 30 days vacation
* Stock Option package

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
At Hemnet, we build one of Sweden’s most widely used digital services. Every day, we help people make some of the biggest decisions of their lives. That puts high demands on reliability, quality, and long-term thinking – and on the engineers who build our product.
   

  

 We’re now looking for a Senior Software Engineer for the Seller Domain to help us continue developing Hemnet. For us,
 **h** 
 ow you think as an engineer matters more than which programming languages you’ve worked with.
   

  

**About The Role 🍏** 
  

  

 At Hemnet, we believe selling your home should be a great experience and as successful as possible. The Seller domain is responsible for the services that help sellers maximize their opportunities in the housing market.
   

  

 As a Senior Software Engineer in the Seller domain, you’ll work with an experienced cross functional team, covering user-facing functionality as well as backend logic. You’ll take responsibility for the bigger picture, both technically to shape our products.
   

  

 Our current stack includes Ruby and Node.js on the backend and Next.js on the frontend. That said, we’re pragmatic about technology and see it as something that evolves over time. We therefore value the ability to quickly learn new languages, frameworks, and systems more than prior experience with any specific stack.
   

  

**Who we think you are** 
 🤩
   

  

**We Believe You’re An Experienced Engineer Who** 
  

  

* Has several years of experience building and maintaining production web systems.
* Is comfortable reasoning about architecture, scalability, and maintainability.
* Learns new technologies and codebases quickly
* Cares about code quality, clarity, and testability.
* Enjoys collaborating and sharing knowledge with others.


  

  

 You don’t need to know everything from day one – but you’re confident in your role as an engineer and curious to keep learning.
   

  

**What you’ll do** 
 💥
   

  

* Build and improve Hemnet’s products across the system.
* Take part in technical discussions and architectural decisions
* Work closely with product, design, and analytics.
* Contribute to a sustainable pace, high quality, and a great developer experience.


  

  

**I am your new manager** 
 👋
   

  

 My name is Johan Boberg, I joined Hemnet in June, prior to Hemnet I worked at Blocket for many years. I have a long career behind me as Engineering Manager and before that, as Backend Developer.
   

  

 As a manager, I am supportive and humble, my goal is to create an environment where you can feel trusted, be challenged and empowered to grow. My job is to lead the team to a productive and creative space where everyone can contribute.
   

  

**A Note on Inclusion** 
 💚
   

  

 At Hemnet, we believe that diversity in gender, sexual orientation, ability, neurodiversity, cultural background and life experience makes us stronger. We welcome applicants of all identities and backgrounds.
   

  

 If you meet many but not all of the requirements, we encourage you to apply. We value curiosity, a strong sense of purpose and the motivation to learn and grow, alongside your skills and experiences.
   

  

**A Hybrid Way of Working** 
 🚲
   

  

 Our vibrant office in central Stockholm is the hub of our collaboration and culture, providing a lively space that fosters team spirit. We come together in the office three days a week, with two flexible remote days. To be part of our team, it’s essential to be based in or near Stockholm.

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**About Kambi**
*Kambi Group plc is a leading B2B provider of premium sports betting services to licensed gaming operators. Our services provide an end-to-end solution for operators wanting to launch a standalone Sportsbook or bolster their existing offering with an innovative sports betting product. From front-end user interface to customer intelligence, risk management and odds compiling, all built on our in-house developed software, we strive to deliver the ultimate service and solution to our partners.*
*Our vision is to create the world’s leading sports betting experiences, together with our partners.*
**About Tzeract**
 Tzeract is changing the way we bet on sports. As Kambi’s in-house startup, we've built a completely new platform from the ground up - with our own AI at the core, not just as an add-on. Today we already handle over 500 millions bets in distributed systems with a low latency, and your work will be scaled globally from day one.
   

  

 We iterate quickly, decide fast, and your calendar stays free for the work that matters. This gives you time for coffee breaks, test ideas and solve problems together. In this role, you’ll help shape both the product and parts of the architecture. It’s the combination of startup freedom with an enterprise touch - and your contributions will be visible and felt by millions of users worldwide.
   

  

**Role Overview**
 We’re looking for
 **a Fullstack Developer with a strong front-end focus** 
 to help us continue to build and innovate our market-leading sports trading tool.
   

  

 This role sits at the intersection of product, trading expertise, and platform engineering. You’ll work closely with our Product Owner, sports trading experts, and platform team to design and deliver intuitive, high-performance user interfaces for complex, real-time trading workflows.
   

  

 Your primary focus will be front-end development using
 **React** 
 , supported by
 **Node.js** 
 and
 **Python** 
 services. You’ll also collaborate closely with teams building backend services written in
 **Python and Rust** 
 , all deployed on
 **AWS** 
 with a strong preference for serverless architectures.
   

  

 If you enjoy turning complex, data-heavy systems into elegant user experiences — and thrive in a collaborative, fast-moving startup environment — this role is for you.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Design, develop, and maintain modern front-end applications using React and MUI X, with a strong focus on usability, performance, and reliability.
* Build and maintain front-end–facing services using Node.js and Python.
* Collaborate closely with Product Owners and sports trading experts to translate complex domain requirements into intuitive user experiences.
* Work alongside backend engineers developing services in Python and Rust to integrate real-time data and trading logic.
* Contribute to cloud-native solutions on AWS, with a preference for serverless designs.
* Participate in architectural discussions across the full stack and help shape front-end standards and best practices.
* Improve developer experience through testing, CI/CD, and shared tooling.
* Continuously evolve the sports trading platform as product and business needs grow.


**What We Believe You Have**
* Strong experience building front-end applications with React (experience with MUI / MUI X or similar libraries is a big plus).
* Solid understanding of fullstack development, including APIs and service integration.
* Experience with Node.js and Python in a production environment.
* Exposure to or interest in backend systems written in Python and/or Rust.
* Experience working with AWS and cloud-native architectures (serverless experience is a plus).
* Familiarity with modern software engineering practices such as automated testing, CI/CD, and version control.
* A collaborative mindset and comfort working closely with product managers and domain experts.
* Enjoyment of a fast-paced startup environment where priorities evolve.


 #wearekambi
   

  

***Kambi's ongoing commitment to Diversity and Inclusion in the workplace***
*If you require any reasonable adjustment during the recruitment process, please notify your recruiter, who will assist you however they can. Diversity and inclusion is at the heart of who we are and who we aim to be. While we are proud of the positive and inclusive company culture we have created, we know we can do so much more. Kambi constantly evolves its Diversity and Inclusion strategy to ensure it becomes an even more inclusive and positive place to work, with the core management team reaffirming its commitment to delivering on employee feedback.*
***Creating an inclusive environment***
*We believe Kambi's greatest strength is the collective talent of our employees. Kambi is committed to ensuring we create an inclusive work environment where everyone can feel valued, thrive and achieve their potential, regardless of who they are or what their background is. We know that it is only by having a balance of different voices, values and opinions that Kambi is able to be the market leader it is today.*
*#wearekambi*

title: Platform Engineer
description:
**About Froda** 




 Froda was founded in 2015 with a clear vision – to revolutionize the banking experience for entrepreneurs by making it easy and affordable to invest in their ideas. Today, we are one of Sweden's fastest-growing fintech companies with large international growth plans. We are a creative tech company with the ambition to turn a historically expensive and unfair industry into something ethical and sustainable by promoting entrepreneurship.
 



  





 Our mission to revolutionize the banking experience for entrepreneurs is not only reflected in our products but also in our workplace. By fostering a culture of respect, collaboration, and continuous learning, we provide opportunities for personal growth and professional development. Join us in transforming the banking industry and be a part of our journey to empower entrepreneurs.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 As Froda continues to scale, we’re looking for a Platform Engineer to join our Platform team — the team at the heart of our technology. The team’s mission is to build and maintain the internal platform that enables and supports our developers to deliver reliable, scalable, and secure fintech solutions efficiently.
 



  





 In this role, you’ll work closely with engineers across Froda to understand their needs and ensure they have the tools, environments, and automation required to succeed. You’ll be part of a small, high-impact team that values helping others, simplifying complexity, and improving developer experience through collaboration and support.
 



 Your work will directly impact how quickly and safely our product teams can innovate, making you a key enabler of Froda’s growth.
 



  





**Who You Are** 




 You’re a technically skilled engineer who takes pride in building robust, scalable systems that others can depend on. You see infrastructure as a shared foundation, one that requires both strong technical execution and close collaboration. You thrive in a team environment, value clear communication, and enjoy enabling others to move faster and more confidently.
 



  





 We’re looking for someone who:
 


* Thrives in a collaborative environment where support and communication are key.
* Enjoys solving infrastructure challenges and enabling others to succeed.
* Is proactive, approachable, and has a strong sense of ownership.
* Balances technical depth with a genuine interest in teamwork and shared success.



  





**Key Qualifications** 




**Experience:** 




 2–5 years in a Platform Engineering, DevOps, or Infrastructure role.
 



**Skills & Tools:** 



* **Infrastructure as Code:** 
 Experience with Terraform or similar IaC tools.
* **Cloud Platforms:** 
 Hands-on experience with Azure, GCP or AWS.
* **CI/CD:** 
 Ability to design, implement, and improve pipelines that serve multiple teams.
* **Containers & Orchestration:** 
 Strong understanding of Docker and Kubernetes in production.
* **Monitoring & Observability:** 
 Experience with tools that support proactive issue detection and team visibility.
* **Security:** 
 Awareness of cloud security best practices and shared responsibility models.



  





**What’s in it for You** 




 At Froda, you’ll be part of a company that combines the best of both worlds, a fast-moving, high-energy culture with the stability and structure to support long-term success. We’re 100+ ambitious self-starters who genuinely care for each other and the work we do, all while having fun together.
 



  





 Here, you’ll have the opportunity to take ownership of your work, develop your skills, and shape your own growth journey. With big ambitions and a rapidly evolving business, there’s plenty of room to grow, lead initiatives, and make a real impact on both our company and the industry. If you're looking to be part of a success story and contribute to something bigger, this is the place for you.
 



  





 Furthermore, you’ll get:
 


* An opportunity to be part of an exciting journey, shaping the future of our company and transforming the SME financing landscape
* Fabulous office overlooking Stockholm and a friendly culture that values work/life balance
* We prioritize working in the office to maximize the positive impact of in-person collaboration, but we offer flexibility with work hours and remote work
* Competitive compensation package
* Insurance and pension plan



  





 This role is all about building the tech that powers funding for thousands of entrepreneurs, if you're excited by our mission, apply or tell a friend!

title: Fullstack developer
description:
Har du några års erfarenhet som utvecklare och är intresserad av nya utvecklingsmöjligheter? Om du vill ha möjlighet att arbeta med både stora och små kunder i moderna utvecklingsprojekt där AI och Cloud är centralt ser vi gärna att du tar chansen och ansöker till oss på Cygni, part of Accenture. Vi letar nu efter nya kompetenta, härliga kollegor till oss både i Stockholm och Göteborg.
   

  

**Vilka är vi?**
 Cygni har funnits sedan 2006 och är sedan 2022 en del av Accenture, en global ledare inom tech och digital transformation. Cygni, part of Accenture är en grupp av härliga personer med hög teknisk kunskap som brinner för systemutveckling i alla dess former. Vi vill påverka, förbättra och skapa värde för våra kunder. Vi älskar teknik och att dela kunskap med varandra, självklart är det också viktigt att ha roligt på vägen. I dag finns Cygni, part of Accenture i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Östersund, Köpenhamn och Helsingfors. Alla våra kontor ligger central med närhet till kommunikation och restauranger.
   

  

 För dig som konsult finns det stora möjligheter, styrt av vad du brinner för och hur du vill utvecklas. Hos oss blir du en del av en unik kombination av kultur, trygghet och möjligheter.
   

  

**Rollbeskrivning**
 Som fullstackutvecklare hos Cygni, del av Accenture är du navet i våra kunduppdrag, ofta tillsammans med kollegor från Accenture. Kunduppdragen varierar och beror på vad som passar dig och din utvecklingsplan bäst. Du kan både vara en del av ett helt åtagande eller en del av ett mindre projekt hos kunden. Ofta arbetar du över hela stacken, från frontend och användbarhet till backend, integrationer och datalager. Möjlighet till att nischa sig inom specifika områden finns självklart också.
   

  

 Utvecklingen sker ofta i molnbaserade miljöer som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud, serverless eller via containers i Kubernetes. Våra kunduppdrag omfattas till stor del av AI, har du erfarenhet eller intresse i att utvecklas inom detta är möjligheterna stora.
   

  

 Vanliga tekniker och koncept i våra uppdrag:
   

  

 C#, .Net, Java, Python, React, Kotlin, Typescript, C#, Node, Go, Vue, Angular, Flutter, Docker, AWS, Azure, GCP, CI/CD, microservices, microfrontends och mycket mer.
   

  

 Många av våra uppdrag erbjuder hybrid- eller helt remote-arbete. Vi uppskattar också om man då och då sitter på våra kontor för att bidra med kunskapsdelning och gemenskap. Vissa av oss är inne varje dag. Detta är upp till vad som passar dig bäst men roligast tror vi att vi har vi tillsammans.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi tror att du:
   

  

  

- Har några års erfarenhet av fullstackutveckling.

- Brinner för smarta tekniska lösningar och hållbar systemdesign.

- Gillar att dela kunskap och vara en relationsskapande konsult.

- Är nyfiken på både nya tekniker och nya sätt att lösa problem.

 Din erfarenhet blir viktig i att bygga skalbara, säkra och robusta system som skapar verkligt värde för våra kunder.

title: Software Engineer within Clinical Decision Support
description:
*Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in e-health with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our e-health solutions supports health care professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.*
**The position**
 Cambio Clinical Decision Support (CDS) is looking for a Fullstack Software Engineer to help us transform the way clinical decisions are supported at the point of care. The CDS team builds intelligent software tools that integrate patient data, clinical guidelines, and analytics into real-time decision-making for healthcare professionals.
   

  

 You will work across both backend and frontend development to build scalable, data-driven applications that impact thousands of clinicians and patients. Our infrastructure follows a modern DevOps approach with continuous integration and delivery.
   

  

**Your Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain high-quality features across the full stack
* Build scalable backend services using Kotlin/Java, Spring Boot, and containerized environments (Docker/Kubernetes)
* Develop performant and accessible frontends using HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript, and Web Components
* Collaborate with requirement owners, developers, and clinical rule modelers to extend our platform
* Contribute to architectural and design decisions with a focus on quality, reliability, and user experience


**About You**
 You are a curious and humble team player who enjoys solving complex problems and following tasks with attention to detail. You’re motivated by the potential of health IT and the opportunity to directly improve patient care.
   

  

 At Cambio, we value initiative and personal growth. Our culture is built on Trust, Care, and Together—values we believe are important to both our work and our people. It’s important to us that you recognize and identify with these values.
   

  

**Requirements** 
  

  

* Proven experience in software development (mid to senior level)
* Strong understanding of HTTP/REST and API design
* Experience developing services with Kotlin/Java/Spring Boot and Docker/Kubernetes
* Solid grasp of HTML, CSS, modern JavaScript/TypeScript, and Web Components
* Professional working proficiency in English


**It's a bonus if you**
* Experience in healthcare or health technology
* Experience in user-centered design and accessibility
* Understanding of machine learning, NLP, or GenAI-based systems
* Experience with rules-based or business process support systems
* Experience deploying and monitoring cloud infrastructure
* Proficiency in Linux/macOS development environments


**Place of employment** 
 : Stockholm
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full-time, hybrid work model (three days per week in-office)
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

**Additional Information:** 
 The role involves access to sensitive information, therefore a background check will be conducted on the final candidate.
   

  

 We review applications and conduct interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
**CAMBIO- FOR A HEALTHIER TOMORROW**
 Welcome to a company where healthcare is improved every day. Here you will work with leading technology in a collaborative, trusting and empowering environment where your contribution will be appreciated and celebrated. In our caring culture you will have the opportunity to pursue different paths of professional growth. Seize the opportunity to do the most important work of your life
 **.** 
 Read more about us
 **here!**
**A healthier tomorrow also means taking care of those who make it possible** 
**-** 
 explore our employee benefits
   

  

 Learn more about our recruitment process here
   

  

 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at our career site.
   

  

 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Software Engineer - Jira/Confluence
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments technology, facilitating transactions between consumers, merchants, financial institutions and government entities across more than 200 countries and territories, dedicated to uplifting everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 At Visa, you'll have the opportunity to create impact at scale — tackling meaningful challenges, growing your skills and seeing your contributions impact lives around the world. Join Visa and do work that matters — to you, to your community, and to the world.
   

  





 Progress starts with you.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 This is a specialized hybrid engineering role designed to evolve over time.
   

  





 In the short term, you will focus on:
   

  




* Administering and improving our internal engineering tools:
* Jira, Confluence, Slack, Google Workspace
* Managing user onboarding/offboarding and permissions
* Supporting engineering teams in troubleshooting issues with Jira & Confluence
* Improving documentation, workflows, and processes
* Implementing automation to simplify repetitive admin requests
* Ensuring the health and reliability of our shared engineering knowledge systems



 In the long term, you will grow toward:
   

  




* Building and maintaining CI/CD pipelines and developer tooling
* Contributing to our internal platform used across Tink
* Working with technologies such as AWS, Kubernetes, Terraform, Datadog, Buildkite, GitHub, Go, Java
* Enhancing platform reliability, observability, and developer experience
* Supporting teams in shipping scalable, secure, high‑quality services
* This role is perfect for someone strong in tooling administration today, who wants to grow into a Developer Productivity / SRE / Platform Engineering path.



 What You Will Do:
   

  





 Tooling Administration & Support (Primary focus initially)
   

  




* Own user management workflows across Jira, Confluence, Slack, Google Workspaces
* Troubleshoot issues across these systems and resolve user requests
* Maintain accurate documentation, access structures, and automation scripts
* Manage incoming tickets (Jira ServiceDesk)



 Developer Productivity & Platform Engineering (Growth path)
   

  




* Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines, internal tools, and automation
* Improve observability and operational excellence (Datadog, metrics, alerting)
* Contribute to platform capabilities used by all engineering teams
* Build infrastructure as code and work within Kubernetes‑based environments
* Help evolve our internal developer platform toward reliability, scale, and efficiency



 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in the office will be confirmed by your Hiring Manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**

 Basic Qualifications:
   

  




* Relevant work experience with a Bachelor’s Degree, Advanced degree (e.g. Masters, MBA, JD, MD) or a PhD, OR relevant work experience.



 Preferred Qualifications:
   

  




* Experience in workstation/tooling support or backend engineering
* Strong experience with Jira, Confluence, Slack, and Google Workspaces
* Experience with onboarding/offboarding workflows
* Automation skills (scripting, APIs, workflow automation)
* Good troubleshooting and communication skills
* Ability to work cross‑functionally and independently



 (You don’t need all of these today — but you should want to grow into them.)
   

  




* Backend engineering experience in Java or Go
* Cloud experience (preferably AWS)
* Experience with CI/CD, GitHub, Buildkite, or similar tools
* Experience with Kubernetes, Docker, Terraform, or Infrastructure‑as‑Code
* Observability tools (Datadog, logging, metrics)
* Experience with SRE or platform engineering practices
* Familiarity with distributed systems


**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: Senior ServiceNow-utvecklare
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
**Om Oss**
 Sopra Steria är Europas ledande konsultföretag inom ServiceNow och digital transformation. Vi hjälper företag och organisationer att effektivisera sina verksamheter genom innovativa teknologilösningar. Med fler än 4000 ServiceNow-experter besitter vi marknadens största och mest framstående ServiceNow-team där du får möjligheten att arbeta med de mest spännande projekten samt utvecklas i en dynamisk och framåtlutad arbetsmiljö. Nu tar vi nästa stora kliv och satsar ännu hårdare på vår ledande position inom ServiceNow. Hos oss får du chansen att vara med och driva utvecklingen framåt, forma framtidens lösningar och göra verklig skillnad. Vill du vara en del av vårt ledande team?
   

  

**Om Rollen**
 I rollen som Senior Utvecklare inom ServiceNow kommer du att vara en nyckelspelare i att utveckla och implementera lösningar på ServiceNow-plattformen för våra kunder. Du säkerställer att tekniska lösningar håller hög kvalitet, är hållbara och anpassade efter kundens verksamhet. Som Elite Partner för ServiceNow har vi en av Skandinaviens största och mest kvalificerade konsultgrupper med närmare 500 dedikerade experter. Vi söker nu en erfaren Senior Utvecklare som kan ta en strategisk och operativ roll i våra teamleveranser.
   

  

**Dina Huvudsakliga Uppgifter**
* Utveckla och konfigurera lösningar på ServiceNow-plattformen.
* Säkerställa teknisk kvalitet och bästa praxis i lösningarna.
* Fungera som rådgivare till kunder kring tekniska lösningar och plattformsutveckling.
* Leda tekniska workshops och kravinsamling med kunder.
* Samarbeta med processledare och andra roller för att säkerställa helhetslösningar.
* Analysera och optimera befintliga lösningar samt identifiera förbättringsområden.


**För att vara framgångsrik i rollen tror vi att du har:**
* Flerårig erfarenhet av utveckling och implementation inom ServiceNow.
* Gedigen kunskap i JavaScript samt god förståelse för webbteknologier som HTML och CSS.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med moduler som ITSM, ITOM, HR eller SecOps.
* Förmåga att leda tekniska dialoger och workshops med kund.
* Relevant akademisk utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande.
* Flytande svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.


**Vi Erbjuder**
* En spännande arbetsmiljö hos Europas ledande ServiceNow-konsultbolag.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med innovativa lösningar och den senaste tekniken.
* Kompetensutveckling genom certifieringar, utbildningar och mentorskap.
* Hybrid arbetsmodell samt konkurrenskraftiga villkor och förmåner.


**Om ServiceNow-teamet På Sopra Steria**
 Sopra Steria är Nordens ledande expert inom ServiceNow – vi har den största och mest specialiserade kompetensen på marknaden. Vårt starka och sammansvetsade team levererar omfattande och högkvalitativa lösningar, där flera av våra erfarna ServiceNow-konsulter samarbetar för att maximera värdet för våra kunder. Vi drivs av innovation, samarbete och kunskapsutbyte – tillsammans sätter vi nya standarder och skapar framtidens digitala lösningar. Vill du arbeta med de bästa? Då är Sopra Steria platsen för dig.
   

  

**Om Sopra Steria**
 Sopra Steria är en av Europas ledande aktörer inom digital transformation, med över 60 000 medarbetare i mer än 30 länder globalt. Vi driver innovation och hjälper företag och organisationer att effektivisera, utvecklas och skapa långsiktigt värde genom banbrytande teknologilösningar.
   

  

 Hos oss arbetar de främsta experterna inom sina områden i en dynamisk och framtidsorienterad miljö där samarbete, nytänkande och teknisk spetskompetens står i centrum.
   

  

**Vill du veta mer om oss? Läs här: Om oss | Sopra Steria**
**Ansökan**
 Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och vara en del av en framstående arbetsplats, ansök genom att ladda upp ditt CV. Kontakta gärna ansvarig rekryterare, Teodor Nellvik (teodor.nellvik@soprasteria.com) eller Business Owner Mikael Kroglund (mikael.kroglund@soprasteria.com) för eventuella frågor om tjänsten.
   

  

 På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

**Välkommen till Sopra Steria – där din kompetens formar framtidens digitala lösningar!**
**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Senior Software Engineer for AI project
description:
**Professional Galaxy** 
 är ett IT- och teknikkonsultbolag som tillhandahåller högspecialiserad kompetens inom IT, mjukvaruutveckling, SAP, inköp, elektronik och mekanisk konstruktion.
   

  

 Vi samarbetar med erfarna seniora experter och levererar strategiskt värdeskapande kompetens till några av Sveriges mest komplexa och analytiskt krävande projekt. Vårt fokus ligger alltid på hög kvalitet, professionalism och tydliga, mätbara resultat.
   

  

 Är du rätt person för uppdraget – eller vill du rekommendera en stark kandidat?
   

  

 Tveka inte att kontakta oss.
   

  

 Ansök gärna redan idag – urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
   

  

**Professional Galaxy** 
 är ett IT- och teknikkonsultbolag som tillhandahåller högspecialiserad kompetens inom IT, mjukvaruutveckling, SAP, inköp, elektronik och mekanisk konstruktion.
   

  

 Vi samarbetar med erfarna seniora experter och levererar strategiskt värdeskapande kompetens till några av Sveriges mest komplexa och analytiskt krävande projekt. Vårt fokus ligger alltid på hög kvalitet, professionalism och tydliga, mätbara resultat.
   

  

 Är du rätt person för uppdraget – eller vill du rekommendera en stark kandidat?
   

  

 Tveka inte att kontakta oss.
   

  

 Ansök gärna redan idag – urval och intervjuer sker löpande.
   

  

**Professional Galaxy söker: Senior Mjukvaruutvecklare (Python, Docker & AI)**
**Beskrivning**
 Vi söker en
 **senior mjukvaruutvecklare** 
 med djup teknisk kompetens inom
 **Python och Docker** 
 , som trivs i en
 **ledande teknisk roll** 
 och har erfarenhet av att arbeta med
 **AI-drivna lösningar** 
 .
   

  

 I denna roll kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i design, utveckling och vidareutveckling av
 **skalbara och robusta system** 
 , samt fungera som
 **teknisk ledare** 
 i team och projekt.
   

  

**Ansvarsområden**
* Designa, utveckla och underhålla backend-lösningar i Python
* Bygga, drifta och optimera containeriserade applikationer med Docker (gärna även Kubernetes)
* Ta tekniskt ägarskap för arkitektur, kodkvalitet och tekniska vägval
* Fungera som technical lead i projekt – vägleda teamet, genomföra kodgranskningar och stötta i komplexa tekniska beslut
* Arbeta nära produktägare, designers och andra utvecklare för att omsätta affärsbehov till tekniska lösningar
* Delta i och driva AI-relaterade projekt, exempelvis inom:
* Maskininlärning
* NLP
* Datadrivna applikationer
* Säkerställa god praxis inom testning, CI/CD, säkerhet och dokumentation


**Kvalifikationer**
* Flera års erfarenhet som mjukvaruutvecklare med tydlig senioritet
* Mycket goda kunskaper i Python och dess ekosystem (t.ex. FastAPI, Django, Flask)
* Stark erfarenhet av Docker och containerbaserad utveckling
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av att arbeta som technical lead eller i en ledande teknisk roll
* Erfarenhet av AI-relaterade projekt, exempelvis:
* Machine learning-pipelines
* Integrering av AI-tjänster eller modeller
* Dataanalys och/eller modellträning
* God förståelse för systemarkitektur, skalbarhet och prestanda
* Vana att arbeta i agila team och i nära samarbete med andra roller


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av Kubernetes och/eller molnplattformar (AWS, GCP, Azure)
* Erfarenhet av MLOps och drift av AI-modeller i produktion
* Erfarenhet av mentorskap eller teknisk coachning
* Konsulterfarenhet eller vana att arbeta kundnära


**Personliga egenskaper**
* Du tar ansvar, är lösningsorienterad och driver arbetet framåt
* Du är kommunikativ och trygg i att fatta tekniska beslut
* Du delar gärna med dig av din kunskap och bidrar till teamets utveckling
* Du är nyfiken på ny teknik, särskilt inom AI och modern systemutveckling


**Ansökan**
 Vänligen ansök direkt via vårt system med:
   

  

* Ditt uppdaterade CV
* Din tillgänglighet för att påbörja uppdraget


 Beskriv i din motivering varför du är lämplig för uppdraget och hänvisa till tidigare konsultuppdrag, anställningar, utbildning och personliga egenskaper.
   

  

**Observera:**
* Vi accepterar inte ansökningar via post
* Alla ansökningar måste skickas via portalen för att vara giltiga
* Löpande urval tillämpas – vi rekommenderar att du ansöker omgående


**Sista ansökningsdag:** 
 2026-03-03 (löpande urval – tjänsten kan tillsättas före deadline)

title: Product Developer
description:
**Job Title:** 




 Product & Business Development Lead
 



**Location:** 




 Solna, Stockholm, Sweden
 



**Client:** 




 Multinational Power Company
 



**Assignment Start:** 




 2nd February 2026
 



**Assignment End:** 




 16th October 2026
 



**Assignment Type:** 




 Residential
 



**Work Schedule:** 




 8 Hours per day / 5 days a week (Hybrid Working)
 



  





**Job Description:** 



* Our client is looking for a qualified and responsible interim colleague who, under a parental substitute, will run and develop the work within the flex area at Customer Solutions Nordic (CSN).
* The flex area includes products and services in smart control of electric car charging (incl. V2X), batteries, solar cells, and heat pumps for the B2C market.
* The role involves a coordinating and driving responsibility where you ensure common direction, prioritization, and coordination in a rapidly changing environment where new processes and working methods need to be continuously established.
* You lead the work on prioritization and roadmap, drive joint initiatives, and form collaborations with Nordic cross-functional organisations and external partners.
* The role also involves participation in strategic forums linked to the development of future energy services.
* You will also support New Propositions in their work to develop and drive product and service development of a broader and more general nature.



  





**Responsibilities:** 



* Ensure strong cooperation and alignment in the flex area at the Nordic level and within the framework of CSN.
* Update and further develop the flex strategy, priority model, and roadmap.
* Conceptualize, initiate, and drive initiatives and projects within the flex business.
* Lead work on offer development and commercial packaging.
* Strengthen the team's ability in the business area and further develop working methods and processes.
* Show how AI and digital tools can be used to support product development and concept design.
* Inspire and challenge the team to rethink products, services, ways of working, and future business opportunities.



  





**Required qualifications and experience:** 



* Experience from energy-related ecosystems, smart homes, or other solution-based digital services with hardware components.
* Experience with agile environments and cross-functional teams (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe).
* Practical experience with AI tools in development or design processes (e.g., ChatGPT, Midjourney, Copilot, Figma AI, Notion AI, etc.) - preferably with examples of how these have been used to develop concepts, create business tests, collect customer and market insights.
* Experience in business testing, MVP development, or experiment-based product development (e.g., Design Thinking, Value Proposition Design).
* At least 5-7 years of experience in business or product development, preferably combined with experience in product management.
* Experience in product and service development of digital solutions in combination with hardware.
* Strong commercial thinking and experience in B2C business.
* Ability to coordinate and run forums, working groups, and steering groups.
* Experience of working in complex and rapidly changing environments with many stakeholders and dependencies.

title: Gameplay Engineer – Future Stories (Creator Tools & Narrative Systems)
description:
As a Gameplay Engineer on Embark's Machine Learning team, you will help shape the future of storytelling tools and systems for video games.
   

  

 We believe modern AI can unlock entirely new creative workflows for narrative design, quest building, lore creation, and player-facing reactivity. Our goal is to investigate how we can design new tools and systems that enable creators to be more ambitious, collaborate more effectively, and explore ideas with less friction rather than simply automating existing workflows.
   

  

 In this role, you will build gameplay-facing systems, tools, and integrations that make AI useful in real production environments—practical, controllable, debuggable, and aligned with the creative vision. You'll work closely with writers, researchers, designers, and other engineers to explore different levels of AI agency to intentionally design where AI agency makes sense and where it doesn't.
   

  

 This is a role for someone who is excited about creative tooling, loves building things that people actually use, and is genuinely enthusiastic about what new AI techniques can enable in games.
   

  

**Example Of Responsibilities**
* Build gameplay systems and tools that enable new narrative workflows and faster iteration for creators
* Collaborate with designers and narrative teams to understand creative needs and turn them into intuitive tooling
* Develop engine integrations and "hooks" that expose the right information for analysis, validation, and experimentation
* Create debugging and diagnostics workflows that make complex systems understandable and easy to iterate on
* Work with writers and designers to explore and prototype AI-native gameplay mechanics that preserve authorial intent while enabling emergence and reactivity
* Prototype experimental features quickly, then help mature the best ideas into robust production-ready solutions
* Help design and evaluate different degrees of AI autonomy, balancing creative ambition, reliability, and control
* Help ensure AI-assisted workflows remain controllable, transparent, and human-driven
* Work across disciplines to integrate tools into real game development pipelines, not isolated demos


**We would love if you have**
* Strong gameplay engineering experience and excellent C++ skills
* Experience working in Unreal Engine
* A passion for tooling, iteration speed, and developer experience
* A creator mindset: you enjoy building systems that make other people more effective
* Comfort collaborating with designers and translating creative goals into technical solutions
* Professional English communication skills


**Additionally, It's a Bonus If You Have**
* Experience building editor tools or content workflows in Unreal Engine
* Familiarity with language models, AI tooling, evaluation, or "human-in-the-loop" creative systems
* Experience with narrative systems, quest pipelines, or other creator-driven game features
* Python experience, or interest in working across engine + services/tooling


 At Embark we offer competitive salaries, passionate colleagues to share knowledge with and much more, but most of all we invite you to take part of a journey into the unknown, to build creative, surprising and beautiful experiences together.
   

  

 We welcome game makers of all sex, class, colour, age, gender identity, education, religion, opinion, culture, nation of origin, language, sexual orientation, shape, size, and ability.
   

  

 Did we leave anyone out? Well, we welcome you, too! We think that the gaming industry is made better when everyone has a seat at the table.
   

  

 Be yourself at Embark and make games while doing so. Please apply with confidence. We can’t wait to hear from you (in English)!

title: BI Developer
description:
**About WPP Media**
 WPP is the creative transformation company. We use the power of creativity to build better futures for our people, planet, clients and communities. For more information, visit wpp.com.
   

  

 WPP Media is WPP’s global media collective. In a world where media is everywhere and in everything, we bring the best platform, people, and partners together to create limitless opportunities for growth. For more information, visit wppmedia.com.
   

  

**Role**
 At WPP Media, we believe in the power of our culture and our people. It’s what elevates us to deliver exceptional experiences for both our clients and each other. In this role it will be critical to embrace WPP & WPP Media’s shared core values:
   

  

* Be Extraordinary by Leading Collectively to Inspire transformational Creativity.
* Create an Open environment by Balancing People and Client Experiences by Cultivating Trust.
* Lead Optimistically by Championing Growth and Development to Mobilize the Enterprise.


**Role Summary And Impact**
 As a BI Developer at WPP Media, you will build and maintain Power BI solutions that help our specialists and clients follow up on media performance. The role is centered around developing user-friendly dashboards, establishing robust data streams, and creating well-structured data models that enable reliable reporting at scale. You’ll translate business needs into technical BI solutions and work closely with engineers, Data Scientists, client teams, and customers - often integrating outputs from different measurement and analytics projects (e.g., MMM, attribution, and other studies) into clear, actionable reporting.
   

  

**Requirements**
**Skills and Experience**
* Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent experience) in Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field
* Experience building and maintaining Power BI solutions, both independently and together with others
* Good knowledge of SQL
* Experience working in a cloud environment, preferably Google Cloud/BigQuery
* Understanding of how data flows and data models are set up to support stable reporting
* Swedish: good understanding in speech and writing
* English: fluent in speech and writing


**Meriting**
* Experience with data modeling and data integration
* Knowledge of DAXs and/or Python
* Experience from media/marketing environments (e.g., agency, publisher, platform)
* Knowledge of digital marketing and media measurement
* Experience working with or visualising outputs from measurement projects (e.g., MMM, attribution)


**Life At WPP Media & Benefits**
 Our passion for shaping the next era of media includes investing in our employees to help them do their best work, and we’re just as committed to employee growth as we are to responsible media investment. WPP Media employees can tap into the global WPP Media & WPP networks to pursue their passions, grow their networks, and learn at the cutting edge of marketing and advertising.
   

  

 In Sweden, our benefits include a SEK 3,000 wellness allowance, a 37,5-hour workweek, half-days and “klämdagar" off, 30 days of vacation, and two paid volunteer days per year. WPP Media Sweden is a member of Almega, and all employees are covered by a collective bargaining agreement (kollektivavtal), which ensures occupational pension, insurance, and other negotiated terms. We host regular team activities, knowledge-sharing sessions, and wellness initiatives throughout the year.
   

  

 WPP Media is an equal opportunity employer and considers applicants for all positions without discrimination or regard to particular characteristics. We are committed to fostering a culture of respect in which everyone feels they belong and has the same opportunities to progress in their careers. We believe the best work happens when we're together, fostering creativity, collaboration, and connection. That's why we’ve adopted a hybrid approach, with teams in the office around four days a week. If you require accommodations or flexibility, please discuss this with the hiring team during the interview process.
   

  

**Application**
 This is a full-time permanent position with a start date as soon as possible. We apply a six-month probationary period. In addition to reviewing your CV and conducting interviews, our recruitment process includes a testing phase. Selection and interviews are ongoing, so please submit your application with your CV and cover letter as soon as possible.
   

  

 We believe that diverse perspectives make us stronger and encourage applications from people of all genders, backgrounds, and experiences.
   

  

**Contact**
 If you have questions about the position, feel free to contact Viktor Åhlén, Head of Operations & Engineering viktor.ahlen@choreograph.com. Due to GDPR, we do not accept applications via email.
   

  

 Please read our Privacy Notice for more information on how we process the information you provide.

title: Software Engineer within eHealth
description:
*Cambio is one of the Nordics' leading suppliers in eHealth with a comprehensive offering for the entire health and care chain. Our eHealth solutions support health care professionals in their daily work and offer patients safer and more easily accessible care. We are proud to be an important part of Swedish healthcare. We are growing continuously and now have about 1000 employees in several countries.*
**The position**
 As a Software Engineer with a backend focus, you will be part of a highly skilled, ambitious tech team building
 **an AI-driven system that operates at the core of clinical workflows** 
 . Cambio Ambient Scribe is an ambient AI assistant that listens to and documents patient–clinician conversations in real time. By reducing administrative burden and saving up to two hours per day for healthcare professionals, the product helps clinicians focus on what truly matters: the patient.
 *Read more* 
 here.
   

  

 In this role, you will take
 **clear ownership of backend design, implementation, and scalability** 
 , ensuring that the system is secure, performant, and ready to scale from a thousand to tens of thousands of users. You will work closely with other engineers with different focus areas, such as frontend/UX, AI, and full-stack.
   

  

 This is a hands-on role for someone who enjoys writing production-quality code, designing robust systems, and taking responsibility for technical decisions in a complex and meaningful domain.
   

  

**Some of the things you’ll do**
* Design, build, and evolve backend services for a mission-critical healthcare AI product.
* Develop and maintain scalable APIs and services, primarily using Python and modern backend frameworks.
* Design data models and storage solutions that ensure performance, reliability, and long-term scalability.
* Build systems with security, privacy, and compliance as first-class concerns.
* Work with container-based architectures and contribute to CI/CD, observability, and operational excellence.
* Collaborate closely with AI, DevOps, and product teams to deliver a high-quality, end-to-end solution.
* Take ownership of technical decisions and help shape the backend architecture as the product and platform evolve.


**We offer**
 At Cambio, you don’t just build software – you build technology that
 **directly improves healthcare** 
 .
   

  

**You’ll Get The Opportunity To**
* Work on a cutting-edge AI product that is deeply integrated into COSMIC, Sweden’s most widely used electronic health record system.
* Be part of a small, highly competent team with strong ownership, short decision paths, and a startup mindset within a stable company.
* Influence architecture and technical direction in a rapidly scaling product.
* Grow with the role – both technically and in responsibility – while working on problems that truly matter to society.


**About You**
 We believe you are a Senior Software Engineer with a backend focus who is comfortable taking responsibility for complex systems and enjoys solving hard problems. You have a calm confidence in your technical skills, but you’re also curious, humble, and continuously learning.
   

  

 Rather than checking every single box, what matters most is that you have a
 **strong foundation and the ability to design and scale backend systems in production** 
 . You enjoy writing code, care deeply about quality, and understand the importance of security and reliability in healthcare systems.
   

  

**We see that you tick some of the following boxes:**
* Strong backend development experience, with Python as a core language.
* Around 5+ years of professional experience in backend engineering or similar roles.
* Experience designing and scaling backend systems in production environments.
* You are comfortable using modern AI tools as a natural part of your development workflow.
* Solid understanding of security principles in backend and cloud-based systems.
* Experience working with containers (Docker) and modern deployment pipelines (CI/CD).
* Experience with relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis) and data modeling for scale.
* Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.
* Ability to take ownership, communicate technical decisions, and work collaboratively in a team.


**Bonus Qualifications**
* Experience with microservice architectures.
* Experience with observability, monitoring, and performance optimization.
* Previous work in healthcare, healthtech, or other regulated environments.


**Place of employment** 
 : Umeå or Stockholm
   

  

**Scope** 
 : Full-time, hybrid work model (three days per week in-office)
   

  

**Form of employment:** 
 Permanent employment, 6 months trial period
   

  

**Additional Information:** 
 The role involves access to sensitive information, therefore a background check will be conducted on the final candidate.
   

  

 We review applications and conduct interviews on a rolling basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible via the link.
   

  

**We look forward to receiving your application!**
**CAMBIO- FOR A HEALTHIER TOMORROW**
 Welcome to a company where healthcare is improved every day. Here you will work with leading technology in a collaborative, trusting and empowering environment where your contribution will be appreciated and celebrated. In our caring culture you will have the opportunity to pursue different paths of professional growth. Seize the opportunity to do the most important work of your life
 **.** 
 Read more about us
 **here!**
**A healthier tomorrow also means taking care of those who make it possible -** 
 explore our employee benefits
   

  

 Learn more about our recruitment process here
   

  

 Are you interested in Cambio but you don’t feel that this position is the perfect match? Check out our other open positions at our career site.
   

  

 Cambio Healthcare Systems is Sweden’s leading suppliers of healthcare information systems and a growing player in the European market with just over 100,000 users across general and university hospitals, specialist units and outpatient units. Through the use of our integrated solutions, our customers provide services to 4 million patients.

title: Integration Specialist – Stockholm
description:
Trivs du med att skapa smarta kopplingar mellan system och dataflöden? Som en del av Solitas integrationscommunity får du jobba nära engagerade specialister och arkitekter som brinner för att forma framtidens integrationslandskap – och utvecklas tillsammans på vägen.
   

  

 Inom vår Connectivity-enhet på Solita har vi över 20 års erfarenhet av integration och processautomation – och vår passion för att hjälpa kunder att skapa robusta, skalbara och framtidssäkra lösningar är lika stark idag som när vi började. Genom att använda den senaste tekniken inom API-design, molnintegration och DevOps säkerställer vi inte bara snabb leverans av affärsvärde, utan också effektiva kopplingar mellan system och dataflöden.
   

  

 En dag på Solita
   

  

 En dag på Solita kan ofta börja med ett standup-möte med kund och dina team-medlemmar, där ni planerar dagens arbete, går igenom prioriteringar och identifierar eventuella utmaningar. Sen kliver du in i ditt arbete: kanske jobbar du med att utveckla integrationer och API:er i exempelvis Azure, migrera integrationer mellan olika plattformar, eller skissa upp en integrationslösning baserat på en kravspec. Under dagen kan det dyka upp ad-hoc möten med kund eller kollegor som behöver stöttning i sitt arbete. Ofta innebär det att lösa problem: kanske behöver du felsöka en oväntad driftstörning, identifiera en flaskhals i ett integrationsflöde eller hitta en ny väg för att möta kundens krav.
   

  

**Emma Fägerlind** 
 som jobbar som Integration Lead hos oss, beskriver sitt nuvarande uppdrag:
   

  

*“Mitt team bygger integrationer som ska stödja HR- och ekonomiprocesser för en kommun. Som integrationsledare har jag en blandad roll där jag både får arbeta med samordning, funktionskrav och teknisk lösning. Jag hjälper att ta fram specifikationer och förstå vad det är vi behöver göra för att lösa kundens behov. När är vi stöter på problem eller frågor försöker få jag teamet att komma framåt genom att lyfta frågor till relevanta parter.*
*Problemlösningen är det roligaste i mitt jobb – att få sätta sig in i nya flöden och tekniker och tillsammans med andra försöka hitta den lämpligaste lösningen. Det är fantastiskt att få vara del av ett team och se hur olika personers egenskaper bidrar på olika sätt till resultatet.”*
 Din roll som Integration Specialist
   

  

 Som Integration Specialist på Solita jobbar du i nära samarbete med arkitekter, utvecklare och kundteam för att skapa helhetslösningar som stöder verksamhetens behov, samt bidrar till plattformsutveckling och kunskapsdelning inom integrationsområdet.
   

  

 I denna roll har du möjlighet att utvecklas inom följande områden:
   

  

**Integration & API developer** 
 – Detta är en mer renodlad utvecklingsroll med fokus på att utveckla och underhålla integrationer mellan system, API:er och molntjänster. Du använder problemlösning och förståelse för affärsprocesser för att definiera optimala lösningar för kunder, samt ansvarar för implementeringen av lösningar enligt kravspec. Tidigare erfarenhet av systemutveckling och förmåga att utveckla och implementera diverse integrationslösningar hjälper dig att ta dig an denna roll.
   

  

**Integration lead** 
 – I denna roll har du chansen att jobba närmare verksamheten där du i dialog med kundens verksamhet och andra system tar fram krav på integrationer, leder integrationsarbetet och tester av integrationer. Här ser vi gärna att du är familjär med integrationskoncept och har tidigare erfarenhet i en teknisk och verksamhetsnära roll där du jobbat med kravhantering samt teknisk design av integrationer.
   

  

 Vi jobbar främst med molnbaserade plattformar eller ramverk i molntekniker. Det är därmed meriterande om du har kunskap inom DevOps, IaC, infrastruktur och nätverk. Några av de plattformar och tekniker vi använder är Microsoft Azure, där fokus ligger på Azure integration services. Samt iPaaS-lösningar (Integration platform as a Service) som Boomi och Workato.
   

  

 Vi letar inte bara efter tekniska skills, vi vill jobba med dig som tar ansvar för att bygga rätt lösningar på rätt sätt genom att utmana med omtanke. Du kommer trivas hos oss om du tycker om att dela med dig av din kunskap lika mycket som du är nyfiken på- och lyfter andras.
   

  

 Karriärbanor på Solita
   

  

 Jobbet som konsult hos oss innebär ofta en brant utvecklingskurva och variation sett till både arbetsuppgifter och roller. Vi ser karriärbanor inte som en specifik trappa utan mer som ett landskap med flera möjliga individanpassade orienteringar, både i höjd- och sidled.
   

  

**Sam** 
 jobbar exempelvis idag som People Lead parallellt med sin roll som Service Delivery Manager.
   

  

**Lia** 
 har haft chansen att bära många hattar under sin tid hos oss – från developer till lead developer och arkitekt i både lokala och gränsöverskridande integrationsprojekt.
   

  

**Andrei** 
 har också utvecklats väldigt brett som scrum master, team/tech lead, SDM, arkitekt, projektledare och kravställare i ett större projekt de senaste 3 åren.
   

  

 Vad vi erbjuder
   

  

 Vår företagskultur är väldigt viktig för oss. Vi värdesätter låg hierarki, självständighet och ansvar, värdeskapande arbete och trevliga kollegor.
 **Här** 
 kan du läsa mer om vår kultur, och
 **här** 
 kan du bläddra bland våra tech-bloggar.
   

  

* Meningsfulla projekt: Arbeta i en agil miljö med varierande uppdrag där du kan påverka teknikval och arbetssätt för att skapa de bästa lösningarna
* Flexibilitet och autonomi för att utforma ditt arbete med flextider– läs mer från vår blogg.
* Ständig utveckling: Vi erbjuder kontinuerlig kompetensutveckling för att säkerställa att våra medarbetare ligger längst fram i teknikutvecklingen.
* Innovativ kultur: Arbeta tillsammans med några av de främsta experterna inom systemintegration, data, AI och cloud.


 Utöver detta får du även ta del av följande
 **förmåner** 
 :
   

  

 💰 Fast lön oberoende av beläggningsgrad
   

  

 🏦 Pensionsavsättning i linje med ITP1 samt möjlighet till löneväxling till ditt pensionssparande vid inkomst över 8,07 inkomstbasbelopp
   

  

 🛋️ Möjligheter till flex för en god work-life-balance
   

  

 🏖️ 30 semesterdagar
   

  

 🩺 Sjukvårdsförsäkring via Skandia för både din mentala och fysiska hälsa som täcker dig även utanför tjänstetid
   

  

 🏋️‍♀️ Friskvårdsbidrag på 5000 kr via Benifex (tidigare Benify).
   

  

 💻 Ett brett nätverk av erfarna specialister från olika områden inom tech att samarbeta med
   

  

 🔗 Intern coach för att stödja ditt välbefinnande
   

  

 🪩 After Work och hobbyaktiviteter
   

  

 🥐 Fredagsfrukost
   

  

 Vilka är vi?
   

  

 Solita är ett värderingsstyrt konsultbolag med över 2200 medarbetare i 10 länder, varav 230 i Sverige. Vår storlek gör oss tillräckligt stora för att vara en stabil och innovativ arbetsgivare, men samtidigt tillräckligt små för att värna om våra medarbetare och kunder. Med bred kompetens inom digital transformation erbjuder vi en dynamisk arbetsmiljö. Hos oss får du friheten att utvecklas, både professionellt och personligt.
   

  

 Intresserad av att höra mer?
   

  

 Låter Det Som En Spännande Utmaning? Skicka In Din Ansökan Och Bli En Del Av Vårt Team Som Ligger i Framkant Inom Systemintegration. Om Du Har Några Frågor, Hör Gärna Av Dig Till
   

  

 People Lead och rekryterande chef
 **Sam Odeh** 
 (sam.odeh(at)solita.se); eller
   

  

 Talent Acquisition Specialist och rekryteringsansvarig
 **Kajsa Törnroos** 
 (kajsa.tornroos(at)solita.se).
   

  

 Hur ser processen ut?
   

  

 I rekryteringsprocessen tror vi på en gedigen och effektiv process. Vi går igenom ansökningar löpande. Om vi ser en potentiell matchning, bjuder vi in dig till ett första möte för att lära känna dig och berätta mer om vår kultur och våra värderingar på Solita. I andra intervjun fokuserar vi på din tekniska kompetens och din erfarenhet. Om allt går bra tar vi oss vidare till sista steget där vi presenterar ett erbjudande och välkomnar dig som ny Solitan!
   

  

**Din arbetsplats kan vara belägen i Stockholm,** 
**Göteborg** 
**eller** 
**Malmö** 
**.**
 Sign up to our newsletter to hear about the latest news, upcoming events and open positions at Solita
   

  

 Subscribe

title: Salesforce utvecklare Stockholm
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
 Sopra Steria har en stark position inom Salesforce i Europa och vi letar nu efter fler duktiga Salesforce-utvecklare som vill vara med och bygga framtidens digitala lösningar. Vi är stolta över att vara Summit Partner med Salesforce och en heltäckande digitaliseringspartner för våra kunder. Nu söker vi dig som vill vara med på vår resa och bidra till innovativa lösningar som gör skillnad!
   

  

**Vad du kommer att bidra med**
 Som Salesforce-utvecklare kommer du att vara en viktig spelare när det gäller att designa, implementera och förvalta Salesforce-lösningar för våra kunder. Din roll innebär att skapa skräddarsydda lösningar som effektiviserar affärsprocesser och skapar långsiktigt värde. Dessutom kommer du att vara med och integrera Salesforce med andra system och applikationer för att skapa en sömlös upplevelse. Vi söker dig som:
   

  

* Har cirka 3 års arbetslivserfarenhet av en liknande roll.
* Har bra koll på Salesforce, inklusive Salesforce Lightning Experience, Apex och Lightning Web Components.
* Har erfarenhet av att integrera Salesforce med andra system och appar.
* Behärskar svenska och engelska flytande, både tal och skrift.
* Är certifierad inom Salesforce (meriterande).


**Varför du kommer att trivas hos oss**
 Hos oss på Sopra Steria handlar det inte bara om att ha ett jobb – här får du möjlighet att växa, utvecklas och verkligen bidra till samhällets digitalisering. Vi tror på frihet under ansvar för en bra balans mellan jobb och fritid!
   

  

 Vi är dessutom stolta över att ha blivit utsedda till
 **Sveriges bästa arbetsplats** 
 av Great Place to Work, där vi fick toppbetyg i kamratskap, arbetsglädje och stolthet. Hos oss får du möjligheten att jobba med riktigt spännande projekt i Europas ledande digitaliseringsbolag. Läs mer om oss
 **här**
**Bli en del av vårt team!**
 Låter det här som en plats där du kan blomstra? Tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan! Vi läser ansökningar och kallar till intervju löpande. Rekryteringsprocessen består av tre intervjuer och ett logiskt test.
   

  

 På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

 Har du frågor om rollen? Hör gärna av dig till vår rekryterre, Viktoria Roosvald (viktoria.roosvald@soprasteria.com).
   

  

 Vi ser fram emot att höra ifrån dig!
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Junior Sales Representative
description:
**About Proxify** 




  





 Proxify is a leading global network of top-tier, vetted remote software, data, and AI professionals, designed to help businesses scale their tech teams with world-class talent, delivering the perfect match within two days on average. Only 1% of applicants, from over 20,000 applications each month, are accepted into the network to ensure unmatched quality. Our service offers the speed, quality, and flexibility that innovative companies demand, with true technical experts to assist at each step enabling you to seamlessly augment your existing team or build a new one without the administrative burden and risk of traditional employment.
 



  





**About the role** 




  





 Are you a true relationship builder with a strong grasp of tech with a wish to develop within sales? This is your chance to invest in your personal development and make a real impact.
 



  





 As a
 **Junior Sales Representative (with German)** 
 , you’ll be part of the client teams and perform the sales activities assigned to you.
 



  




* **Account growth & retention** 
 : Take on opportunities to upsell or cross-sell, be a part of contract negotiations, and secure long-term client loyalty by delivering value.
* **Project coordination** 
 : Work closely with Account Managers to meet client needs, keep deadlines, and ensure deliverables align with expectations.
* **Performance monitoring & reporting** 
 : Track account performance, prepare clear reports, and provide actionable recommendations.
* **Matching** 
 : Use your tech know-how to match the right developer to customer needs, collaborating with the account manager and a client engineer for support.



  





**Client Focus:** 
 Global Enterprise Clients ( > 2 000 employees).
 



  





**Why you’ll love this opportunity at Proxify:** 




  





 🌐 Help tech teams close skill gaps and create job opportunities for developers worldwide.
 



 ❤️ Be part of a humble, supportive, and tech-savvy team.
 



 📈 Spearhead the growth of client partnerships.
 



 🚀 Great opportunities for professional development and personal growth.
 



 ✈️ Work in a truly international team of 39 countries, with occasional in-person meetups.
 



  





**Was du mitbringst, um in dieser Rolle erfolgreich zu sein:** 




  




* Ein starkes Verantwortungsbewusstsein mit einer ausgeprägten Hands-on-Mentalität und hohem Qualitätsanspruch.
* Die Fähigkeit, Verantwortung mit Dringlichkeit zu übernehmen, um Effizienz sicherzustellen und gleichzeitig eine hohe Qualität zu wahren.
* Ein gutes Verständnis dafür, wie man Kund:innen optimal unterstützt und sie durch die gesamte Customer Journey begleitet.
* Von Natur aus kontaktfreudig, neugierig und zielorientiert.
* Ein bodenständiger Teamplayer, der sich in einem leistungsorientierten Umfeld wohlfühlt.
* Deutsch auf muttersprachlichem Niveau sowie sehr gute Englischkenntnisse



  





**Bonus points** 
 : hands-on experience with technology, such as working as a technical project manager, product manager, developer, or a similar role (ideally within tech or SaaS).
 



  





**Why it may not be your match:** 




  





 ❌ You like every day to look the same (clear routines and process), this might not be for you because we build as we go and keep things agile.
 



 ❌ You lack any exposure to or understanding of tech and its applications.
